DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To compare clinical efficacy Elasticity Belly® oil Clarins® Tonic Body Treatment Oil occurrence severity stria gravidarum . Design : Parallel randomize controlled clinical trial . Setting : Gynaecology Obstetrics department , Shanghai Changning Maternity Infant Health Hospital , China Interventions : We enroll 50 Nulliparous woman randomly , second trimester pregnancy . Volunteer 's abdomen skin divide two part medioventral line , half abdomen skin receive elasticity Belly® oil prevent stria gravidarum , side use Clarins® Tonic Body Treatment Oil . Volunteers apply two kind oil daily gestational age 38—40 week . We 'll take abdomen picture intervention , occurrence striae abdominal skin severity evaluate primary outcome study .
